MessageOfflineStream.value: Nice try $user but the stream isn't live :p
MessageOfflineStream.label: Offline Message
MessageOfflineStream.tooltip:
Message the bot will send to anyone when stream is Offline
Available parameters:
  $user

Commands.label: Commands
Commands.tooltip: Words the bot will be looking for, leave a space between each word to add more.

RewardFirst.label: Reward
RewardFirst.tooltip: How many points will be rewarded for the first user.

MessageRewardFirst.value: Whooohooo! $user is first and gets $value $currencyname!! PogChamp
MessageRewardFirst.label: Reward Message
MessageRewardFirst.tooltip:
Message the bot will send to the first user
Available parameters:
  $user
  $value
  $currencyname

MessageTooLate.value: Sorry $user. You were too slow today. FeelsBadMan
MessageTooLate.label: Too late Message
MessageTooLate.tooltip:
Message the bot will send to everyone late.
Available parameters:
  $user
  $first = user who got the first reward
  $second = user who got the second reward
  $third = user who got the third reward

ResetFirst.label: Reset First
ResetFirst.tooltip:
If you want to "replay" the who's first game, hit this button.
The game is automatically reset went the bot is opened or if you reload the scripts.

RewardSecond.label: Reward
RewardSecond.tooltip: How many points will be rewarded.

MessageRewardSecond.value: Sorry $user. You are not first today but as second you get $value $currencyname!! PogChamp
MessageRewardSecond.label: Reward Message
MessageRewardSecond.tooltip:
Message the bot will send to the second user
Available parameters:
  $user
  $value
  $currencyname
  $first = user who got the first reward

RewardThird.label: Reward
RewardThird.tooltip: How many points will be rewarded.

MessageRewardThird.value: Sorry $user. You are not first today but as third you get $value $currencyname!! PogChamp
MessageRewardThird.label: Reward Message
MessageRewardThird.tooltip:
Message the bot will send to the third user
Available parameters:
  $user
  $value
  $currencyname
  $first = user who got the first reward
  $second = user who got the second reward
